column4: hi all--I'm a linux newbie, just set up a dual-boot with suse, but it's going terribly.  I hear I'll have a much better time with ubuntu--true?
well the ubuntu install will detect your windows install and set up the dual boot for you.
the dual boot works fine, it's just that I can't modify suse--there are all sorts of problems with yast getting things to install
well theres no harm in trying ubuntu out.
